commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: It's almost time for the meeting. Are you doing okay, Shioriko?

commands.speaker: Shioriko
commands.line: Yes. I put more thought into what we discussed the other day.

commands.speaker: Shioriko
commands.line: As a result, I was able to come to a decision.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Really?! That's great! We might be able to settle on everything at today's meeting, then!

commands.speaker: Shioriko
commands.line: Yes, I hope so... No, I will make sure we do.

commands.speaker: Shioriko
commands.line: That is why I would like you and the other student council members to begin preparations so that our work can proceed smoothly after the meeting.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: That's fine with me, but are you sure you'll be okay on your own?

commands.speaker: Shioriko
commands.line: I'll be fine. Please believe in me.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: You've got it, Shioriko. Please try your best!

commands.speaker: Shioriko
commands.line: Now then, I would like to begin our seventh meeting concerning the school tour.

commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: I wonder if it will go okay today.

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: Our club president has been helping a lot, too, so I think we'll be able to come to some sort of agreement.

commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: Yes, you're right.

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: Yeah. Let's believe in her and Shioriko!

commands.speaker: Head of Basketball Club
commands.line: Did you look at the counterproposal we gave you the other day?

commands.speaker: Shioriko
commands.line: Yes. I read through everything I received.

commands.speaker: Head of Basketball Club
commands.line: And did you consider our suggestions?

commands.speaker: Shioriko
commands.line: Let me go through everything in order. First, please take a look at the document in front of you.

commands.speaker: Head of Softball Club
commands.line: All right. Oh?

commands.speaker: Shioriko
commands.line: Is something the matter?

commands.speaker: Head of Basketball Club
commands.line: Is everything written here true?

commands.speaker: Shioriko
commands.line: Yes.

commands.speaker: Shioriko
commands.line: We can fine-tune everything later, but as you see written in the document, I will let each club decide what they will be doing on stage.

commands.speaker: Shioriko
commands.line: Please be sure to promote the things that make your club appealing in a way that will make students want to join.

commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: Wow. This is much different than before. I can't believe how much things have changed.

commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: I knew our club president was coordinating negotiations with the other club heads, but it looks like all of the clubs' requests were the ones that were granted.

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: Shioriko... I guess she wanted to take a step back and let the clubs do things their own way.

commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: Yes, it seems that way. There should be no objections now.

commands.speaker: Head of Softball Club
commands.line: Now we can really show everyone our club's charms.

commands.speaker: Shioriko
commands.line: However, as mentioned in the document, please make sure to disclose this one important fact.

commands.speaker: Shioriko
commands.line: Depending on where a student's skills lie, they may be encouraged to join another club.

commands.speaker: Head of Basketball Club
commands.line: Then nothing has changed from before!

commands.speaker: Shioriko
commands.line: That is not true. Per your request, each club may now handle their club introductions as they please.

commands.speaker: Shioriko
commands.line: I do not think it is very fair that you are unwilling to compromise when I have made so many concessions on my end.

commands.speaker: Head of Softball Club
commands.line: But still, that doesn't mean...

commands.speaker: Shioriko
commands.line: I only have one request. You must announce what I just said to the students when you are standing on stage.

commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: Wh-What should we do? Things are getting tense again.

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: It's okay. Let's just watch over her, Setsuna.

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: Shioriko actually told me something the other day.

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: She said that even if an activity seems like a waste of time, that doesn't mean every step of it should be dismissed as worthless.

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: Can you believe how much her mindset has changed? I want to believe in those words.

commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: Shioriko said that?

commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: Very well. If you think it'll be okay, I will watch over her too.

commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: Anyway, I know just how much Shioriko thinks about the students of this school and how she always puts them first.

commands.speaker: Head of Softball Club
commands.line: Depending on your skills, you might be encouraged to join another club. That's the last thing I want to tell the students.

commands.speaker: Shioriko
commands.line: I won't budge on the line specifying that, depending on where a student's skills lie, they may be encouraged to join another club.

commands.speaker: Shioriko
commands.line: However, that does not mean we should force the students to join certain clubs or deny them from others.

commands.speaker: Shioriko
commands.line: Nijigasaki High School carefully considers every student's skills and helps them find a path that will leave them with the fewest regrets.

commands.speaker: Shioriko
commands.line: So if the students enroll here, they will have nothing to worry about. Please be sure to tell them that.

commands.speaker: Head of Basketball Club
commands.line: Huh? So students can join any club they want?

commands.speaker: Shioriko
commands.line: Yes. Do you find these conditions satisfactory?

commands.speaker: Head of Softball Club
commands.line: If that's how it is, I have no objections.

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: Yes!

commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: I'm so happy! I feel like everything has fallen into place!

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: Yes. Shioriko's way of doing things isn't wrong. I'm sure many new students will hear her message and feel relieved. This is the best compromise.

commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: Yes. Shioriko is definitely suited to being student council president after all.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Great work, Shioriko. I'm glad everyone could reach an agreement in the end.

commands.speaker: Shioriko
commands.line: Thank you very much. I owe it all to you and your negotiations with the club heads.

commands.speaker: Shioriko
commands.line: This meeting would not have been possible without your help.

commands.speaker: Shioriko
commands.line: Also...

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Also?

commands.speaker: Shioriko
commands.line: I learned many things from practicing with the school idol club.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Really?! Then did your opinion of school idols...?

commands.speaker: Shioriko
commands.line: Please wait! My views on school idols have not changed. I am unsure how to put it into words, but I felt something. That is all.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: That's plenty, Shioriko. School idols are all about feelings. If you watch them and feel good or like what they're doing, then that's what it's all about.

commands.speaker: Shioriko
commands.line: *Scoff* Don't you think you are a little too optimistic?

commands.speaker: Shioriko
commands.line: Well, I suppose it is important to be open-minded.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Hey, I think everyone's still practicing in the clubroom. Let's go join them!

commands.speaker: Shioriko
commands.line: I have to organize the documents from today's meeting.

commands.speaker: Shioriko
commands.line: If I finish early, I will meet you there.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Okay!
